recipesJson.name: Butter pecan waffle cone
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: I made this  last night and I put it in my tank this morning I dripped a little last night but this morning it was amazing. Or at liest I think it's amazing. Give it a try and let me know what you think  I am just taking a guess on the best tasting steep time but honestly after 10 hours it's amazing. You could probably lose the meringue but it's good with it but I doubt it would taste much different with out it.
